items.title: Mauritius hints Chagos talks stuck over money
items.description: The deputy PM said the UK was "quibbling" over the sum to be handed over to Mauritius.

items.title: Luigi Mangione pleads not guilty to murdering healthcare CEO
items.description: The 26-year-old suspect is facing separate federal charges that could lead to a death sentence.

items.title: Man arrested over death of woman set on fire on New York subway
items.description: The woman fatally set alight on a Brooklyn train was attacked by a man she is not believed to have known.

items.title: Kremlin denies reports Assad's wife has filed for divorce
items.description: Following reports in Turkish media, a Kremlin spokesman denies Asma al-Assad wants to divorce her husband and leave Russia.

items.title: Children among dozens killed in Israeli strikes, Gaza officials say
items.description: A school sheltering displaced families was hit, according to Gaza's civil defence agency.
